contents.text: Thank you for calling Anomali on the Peninsula, your trusted threat intelligence platform.
For technical support and incident response, press 1.
To report a new security incident, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our incident response team.

navigationGoals: I need to report a critical security breach we just discovered on our network.
I need to report a suspected security breach our team has just uncovered.
Log a new security breach with Indicators of Compromise for incident response review
Please help me report a new security incident to your incident response team.
I need to report a suspected security breach on our lab network.

contents.text: For help with platform access or account issues, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our support specialists.

navigationGoals: I’m locked out of my Anomali account and need to regain access immediately.
I’m locked out of my Anomali account and need help resetting my access.
Troubleshoot an SSO authentication error blocking access to the threat intelligence dashboard
I can’t log into my Anomali platform and need assistance accessing my account.
I can’t access my Anomali account and need help resetting my password.

contents.text: For sales and product inquiries, press 2.
To schedule a product demonstration, press 1.
Please hold while we transfer you to a product specialist.

navigationGoals: I’d like to schedule a live demonstration of your platform for my security team.
I’d like to schedule a product demonstration of the threat intelligence platform.
Book a technical demo focused on API integration and threat feed ingestion workflows
I want to schedule a demo of the Anomali platform to learn how it works.
I’d like to schedule a demonstration of the Anomali platform for our research group.

contents.text: For pricing, licensing, or billing inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our billing and licensing department.

navigationGoals: I want to get detailed pricing and licensing options for about 50 endpoints.
I need detailed pricing and licensing information for an enterprise subscription.
Get detailed subscription tier, seat-based licensing, and billing cycle information
I have questions about my billing and licensing fees and need help understanding them.
I have questions about licensing costs for an academic subscription.
